page.title: 20Marlow Rugby Club
page.content: I joined{Marlow Rugby Club}when I was nine back in 1982. I have been going for about three years. At first I played in the 'B' team, which is the second team, but when I got better I was promoted to the 'A' team. We train on Sundays from 10.00am till 12.00pm. In training we do lots of different exercises to improve our strength and coordination. Sometimes we play matches. I have five medals for rugby and lots of certificates. In a rugby team there are nine players, that is because I play mini-rugby. Next season I play 15 a side Rugby. Rugby is a great game and I like it very much. In mini-rugby they play seven minutes each way, but they play forty minutes in each half in the full game.
